content: materials drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-250-250-300-300-350 g color 16 white drops circular needle 60 or 80 cm / 24 or 32 size 5 mm/us 8 or size needed to get 17 stitches and 22 row in stockinette stitch = width 10 cm / 4 and 10 cm / 4 vertically drops circular needle 40 + 60 or 80 cm / 16 + 24 or 32 size 4 5 mm/us 7 - for edges in garter stitch
